resources.string: Sadaqah or Saddka is an Islamic term that means "voluntary charity". This concept encompasses any act of giving out of compassion, love, friendship, religious duty or generosity.
One good thing about donation, once you do it, you get addicted to it because it brings great joy and happiness to you.
zakat is meant to be paid in order to purify the wealth. Therefore, those Muslims who have enough wealth have to give a little amount i.e. 2.5% of your wealth to the poor and needy.
